alfredsnippet.snippet:
"In the USA senators and congressmen have succeeded in establishing a Center for Alternative Medicine with an initial annual budget of one million dollars, against the fierce resistance of the scientific establishment that spoke of squandering and quackery. But the research results were so promising that the budget has now been increased to 100 million dollars. Even that is still minimal compared to the many billions spent on conventional research."

- Interview with Rupert Sheldrake, Die Zeit, July 11, 2002
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Rupert Sheldrake on the Center for Alternative Medicine
